mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BRANCH WHERE AREA = #{area} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.SUMBRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY - B.CNTORDER FROM (SELECT SUM(BRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY) AS SUMBRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY FROM TB_BRANCH WHERE AREA= #{area} DELETE_YN = 'N') A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNTORDER FROM TB_LAUNDRY_ORDER WHERE BRANCH_CODE LIKE #{area}||'%' AND ORDER_STATUS = '01' AND PICKUP_REQUEST_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')) B

SELECT A.SUMBRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY - B.CNTORDER FROM (SELECT BRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY AS SUMBRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY FROM TB_BRANCH WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}) A, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNTORDER FROM TB_LAUNDRY_ORDER WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode} AND PICKUP_REQUEST_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND ORDER_STATUS = '01') B

SELECT branch_code FROM ( SELECT branch_code FROM tb_branch ORDER BY branch_code DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
and branch_code like '%'||#{area}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into tb_branch ( BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, ZIP, BRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY, BRANCH_CONTACT, TOPAREA, ADD1, ADD2, AREA ) values( #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{zip}, #{branchLndrpcrymslmcoqy}, #{branchContact}, #{toparea}, #{add1}, #{add2}, #{area} )
